channel.title: Hosting help
channel.description:
Okay I did all the steps for port-forwarding but how do I get the server to use that ip address to run? I changed a file called Server to:
[code] if ( /* * connectingHost.startsWith("pkerzcapez") || * connectingHost.equals("pkerzcapez.no-ip.biz") */true) {[/code]
But it wont work still.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2009, 08:48:07 am[/size][hr]It still lets me connect to a local host but I wanted my friend to play from his house.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2009, 09:11:45 am[/size][hr]Why does no1 ever post on this... :confused: :confused: :confused:
